segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and it’s making me feel a bit sick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, and I can’t believe how messy this is going to get.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and I’m just waiting for the water to make everything slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is watching him, and she doesn’t seem to care about the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should turn around and see what’s happening before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks nice, but inside, it’s a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the water will ruin the floor and make everything smell bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the cookies, he doesn’t even realize how messy he’s being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman is so oblivious to the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just gross to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
